<A NAME="eolPage222"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG009.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ARTICLE III
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	BORROWER&#146;S WARRANTIES AND
	COVENANTS
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	3.1 Except to the extent already disclosed in writing by the Borrower to the Lender, the Borrower shall be deemed to have assured, confirmed and
	undertaken as follows:
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(a) Conflict with Constitutional documents
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Nothing in
	this Agreement conflicts with any provisions of the Borrower&#146;s constitutional documents
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) No director who is on the board of the Borrower declared as a
	willful defaulter and/or as non-cooperative borrower
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	No director is on its Board who is also a director on the board of a willful defaulter or a non cooperative
	borrower
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(c) Right to disclose the names and particulars of the Borrower and the credit facilities availed of / to be availed, by the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	i. The Lender shall have the right to disclose the information relating to the Borrower to Credit Information Bureau (India) Limited (CIBIL), Central Repository of Information on
	Large Credits (CRILC) or any other similar agency, which in turn shall have the right to use the information as authorised in this behalf by RBI.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ii. The Lender
	shall have the right to disclose the information and data relating to the Borrower to other agencies in the business of credit.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	iii. The Borrower hereby declares
	that the information and data furnished by the Borrower to the Lender are true and correct.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(d) Valid and Subsisting Licenses
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) The Borrower duly owns or holds valid and subsisting licenses in respect of all trade names, trade marks, patents, designs and other intellectual property used or intended to
	be used by the Borrower in the course of its business and the same are duly registered in the name of the Borrower and have not become voidable.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii)The Borrower
	duly owns or holds all other material consents, licenses, franchises, permits and authorisations necessary for the lawful conduct, ownership and operation, of its business, and the same are valid and subsisting and have not become voidable.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(e) No Claims and liabilities other than those disclosed
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The Borrower does
	not have any claims or liabilities including, without limitations, provident fund or labour dues, income /corporate or other taxes, duties, levies or cesses, royalties, license fees, lease rentals, interest costs, penal levies, default rates,
	damages, claims, penalties etc.(whether present, future or contingent) which are not expressly disclosed either:
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>

<A NAME="eolPage223"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG010.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) in the Borrower&#146;s last audited balance sheet furnished to the Lender; or
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) otherwise to the Lender in writing as &#147;off -balance sheet liabilities&#148;; or (iii) in any other written communication to the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(f) Non-existence of event of default
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The Borrower shall satisfy the Lender that no event of
	default as defined in Article V hereof and no event which, with the lapse of time or giving of notice and lapse of time as specified in Article V, would become an event of default, has happened and been continuing.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(g) Project
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The Borrower shall,
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) Project changes
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Promptly notify the Lender of any proposed change in the nature or scope
	of the project and of any event or condition, which might materially and adversely affect or delay completion of the project or result in substantial overrun in the original estimate of costs. Any proposed change in the nature or scope of the
	project shall not be implemented or funds committed therefore without the prior approval of the Lender;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) Contract change
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Obtain concurrence of the Lender to any material modification or cancellation of the Borrower&#146;s agreements with its machinery suppliers, collaborators, technical consultants
	and suppliers of raw materials;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(iii) Delay in completing the project
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Promptly inform the Lender of the circumstances and conditions, which are likely to disable the Borrower from implementing the project, or which are likely to
	delay its completion or compel the Borrower to abandon the same.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(h) Current account
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The Borrower shall open a current account with the Lender and all disbursement of the Loan shall ordinarily be routed through the said account
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) Utilisation of the Loan
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The Borrower shall furnish to the Lender:
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(a) (i) at the end of each month following the month in which the Loan is
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	disbursed, a
	statement duly certified by statutory auditor/ Chartered Accountant, certifying the manner in which the said monies have been utilised.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) information and
	statements relating to its business, utilisation of the Loan its assets and other information relating to the group/ subsidiaries as may be required from time to time, including duly audited annual account.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) The Loan shall not be utilised for any purpose other than for which it is sanctioned and, in particular (including but not limited to), it shall not be utilised for any of the
	following purposes:
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	i) subscription to or purchase of shares/debentures and investment in real estate;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage224"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG011.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ii) repayment of dues of promoters/associate concerns/intercorporate deposits, etc;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	iii) for extending loans/facilities to subsidiary or associate companies or for making any inter-corporate deposits, and
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	iv) for any speculative purposes.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	3.2 General covenants
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	A) Unless otherwise agreed to by the Lender, the Borrower shall,
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) Notice of winding up or
	other legal process
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Promptly inform the Lender regarding any litigation against the Borrower, any of its properties or business or undertaking or if a Receiver is
	appointed of any of its properties or business or undertaking;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) Adverse changes in profits and production
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Promptly inform the Lender of the happening of any labour strikes, lockouts, shutdowns, fires or any event likely to have a substantial effect on the Borrower&#146;s profits or
	business and of any material changes in the rate of production or sales of the Borrower with an explanation of the reasons therefor;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(iii) Insurance
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(a) keep all its assets adequately insured at all time and such of its other properties as are of an insurable nature against fire, theft, lightning, explosion, earthquake, riot,
	strike, civil commotion, storm, tempest, flood, marine risks, erection risks, war risks, and such other risks as may be specified by the Lender and shall duly pay all premia and other sums payable for that purpose. The insurance in respect of the
	properties charged/to be charged to the Lender shall be taken in the joint names of the Borrower and the Lender and any other person or institution having an insurable interest in the properties of the Borrower and acceptable to the Lender. The
	Borrower shall keep deposited with the Lender the insurance policies and renewals thereof;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) agree that, in the event of failure on the part of the Borrower to
	insure the assets or to pay the insurance premia or other sums referred to above, the Lender may get the assets insured or pay the insurance premia and other sums referred to above, as the case may be,
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(c) agree that the Lender shall have sole discretion to appropriate the proceeds, if any received from the insurance company in satisfaction of the Loan / the Facility,
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(d) agree that it shall furnish certificate from an auditor, acceptable to the Lender, certifying the adequacy of insurance taken by it,
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(e) agree that it shall inform the Lender of the happening of any of the events specified in sub clause (a) above and the loss or damage which the Borrower may suffer due to any of
	the aforesaid events for which the assets are insured.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage225"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG012.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(iv) Imposts, costs, charges and expenses
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	During
	the currency of the Loan bear all such imposts, duties and taxes (including interest and other taxes, if any) as may be levied from time to time by the Government or other authority with the sanction of law pertaining to or in respect of the Loan,
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(a) pay all other costs, charges and expenses in any way incurred by the Lenders (including costs of investigation of title and protection of Lender&#146;s
	interest) and such additional stamp duty, other duties, taxes, charges and other penalties if and when the Borrower is required to pay according to the laws for the time being in force in the State in which its properties are situated or otherwise;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) agree that in the event of the Borrower failing to pay the monies referred to in sub-clause (a) the Lender will be at liberty (but shall not be obliged) to pay
	the same. The Borrower shall reimburse all sums paid by the Lender in accordance with the provisions contained in this Agreement.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(c) (i) The Borrower shall
	reimburse all sums paid by the Lender under the provisions of this Agreement within 30 days from the date of notice of demand from the Lender. All such sums shall be debited to the Borrower&#146;s Loan Account and shall carry interest from the date
	of payment till such reimbursement at the maximum Applicable Lending Rate (in the case of rupee loans). In the case of foreign currency loans such interest shall be paid at 3.5% above the then prevailing Bank&#146;s Prime Lending Rate.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) In case of default in making such reimbursement within 30 days from the date of notice of demand, the Borrower shall also pay on the defaulted amounts, liquidated damages at
	the rate of .....% per annum from the expiry of 30 days from the date of notice of demand till reimbursement.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(iii) The Borrower hereby authorise the Lender to
	debit its current account with the Lender to the extent of expenditure incurred under this Agreement.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(v) Annual accounts
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Submit to the Lender its duly audited annual accounts within six months from the close of its accounting year. In case statutory audit (if required) is not likely to be completed
	during this period, the Borrower shall get its accounts audited by an independent firm of Chartered Accountants and furnish the same to the Lender;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(vi) Memorandum
	and Articles of Association
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Carry out such alterations to its Memorandum and Articles of Association as may be deemed necessary in the opinion of the Lender to
	safeguard the interests of the Lender arising out of this Agreement;
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	B) Without the prior written approval of the Lender, the Borrower shall not,
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) New project
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Undertake any new project, diversification, modernisation or substantial
	expansion of the project described in this Agreement. The word &#147;substantial&#148; shall have the same meaning as under the Industries (Development and Regulation) Act, 1951.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage226"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG013.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) Loans, debentures and charges
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Issue any
	debentures, raise any loans, accept deposits from public, issue equity or preference capital, change its capital structure or create any charge on its assets or give any guarantees. This provision shall not apply to normal trade guarantees or
	temporary loans and advances granted to staff or contractors or suppliers in the ordinary course of business or raising of unsecured loans, overdrafts, cash credit or other facilities from banks in the ordinary course of business.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(iii) Premature Repayment
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Prepay any loan availed by it from any other party for the project
	without prior written approval of the Lender, which may be granted subject to such conditions as may be stipulated by the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(iv) Commission
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Pay any commission to its promoters, directors, managers, or other persons for furnishing guarantees, counter guarantees or indemnities or for undertaking any other liability in
	connection with any financial assistance obtained for or by the Borrower or in connection with any other obligation undertaken for or by the Borrower for the purpose of the project.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(v) Subsidiaries
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Create any subsidiary or permit any company to become its subsidiary.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(vi) Merger, Consolidation, Etc.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Undertake or permit any merger,
	consolidation, re-organisation, scheme of arrangement or compromise with its creditors or shareholders or effect any scheme of amalgamation or reconstruction.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(vii) Dividend
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Declare or pay dividend to its shareholders so long as the
	Borrower is in default to the Lender under this Agreement and is not in compliance with stipulated financial covenants.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(viii) Investments by Borrower
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Make any investments by way of deposits, loans or in share capital of any other concerns (including subsidiaries) beyond projected and accepted level by the Lender so long as any
	money remains due to the Lender; the Borrower will however be free to deposit funds by way of security with third party in the normal course of business or if required for the business.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ix) Revaluation of assets
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Revalue its assets at any time during the currency of the Loan.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	3.3 Management
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	a.The Borrower shall, as and when required by the Lender,
	appoint and change to the satisfaction of the Lender, the managing director, whole time director, suitable technical, financial and executive staff of proper qualifications and experience for the key posts. The terms of such appointments, including
	any changes therein, shall be subject to prior approval of the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	b.(i) Lender shall have the right to appoint, whenever they consider necessary, any person,
	firm, company or association of persons engaged in technical, management or any other consultancy business to inspect and examine the working of the Borrower and its factory and to report to the Lender. The Lender shall have the right to appoint,
	whenever they consider necessary, any Chartered Accountants/Cost Accountants as auditors for carrying out any specific assignment(s) or to examine the financial or cost accounting system and procedures adopted by the Borrower for its working or as
	concurrent or for conducting a special audit of
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage227"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG014.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	the Borrower. The costs, charges and expenses including professional fees and travelling and other expenses of such consultants or
	auditors shall be payable by the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) The Borrower shall constitute such committees of the Board with such composition and functions as may be required
	by the Lender for close monitoring of different aspects of its working.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	3.4 Nominee Director
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) The Lender shall have the right to appoint and remove from time to time, a Director Board of Directors of the Borrower (such director is hereinafter referred to as
	&#145;Nominee Director&#146;).
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) The Nominee Director shall not be required to hold qualification shares and not be liable to retire by rotation.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(iii) The Nominee Director shall be entitled to all the rights and privileges of other directors including the sitting fees and expenses as payable to other directors but if any
	other fees, commission, monies or remuneration in any form is payable to the directors, the fees, commission, monies and remuneration in relation to such Nominee Director shall accrue to the Lender and the same shall accordingly be paid by the
	Borrower directly to the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Provided that if any such Nominee Director is an officer of the Lender, the sitting fees in relation to such Nominee Director
	shall also accrue to the Lender and the same shall accordingly be paid by the Borrower directly to the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Any expenditure incurred by the Lender or the
	Nominee Director in connection with his appointment or directorship shall be borne by the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(iv)The Nominee Director shall be appointed a Member of the
	Management Committee or other committees of the Board, if so desired by the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(v) The Nominee Director shall be entitled to receive all notices, agenda and
	minutes, etc. and to attend all General Meetings and Board Meetings and meetings of any committees of the Board of which he is a member.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(vi) If, at any time, the
	Nominee Director is not able to attend a meeting of the Board of Directors or any of its committees, of which he is a member, the Lender may depute an observer to attend the meeting. The expenses incurred by the Lender in this connection shall be
	borne by the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised
	Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage228"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG015.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ARTICLE IV
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	REPORTS AND INSPECTION
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	4.1 Auditor&#146;s certificate
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) At the request of the Lender, caused an investigation
	conducted by its statutory auditors to ascertain whether there had been any diversion / siphoning of funds by the Borrower. The cost of the investigation shall be borne by the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) Notwithstanding anything contained in hereinabove, the Borrower agrees that the Lender may give instructions to its statutory auditors to carry out the investigation as to
	whether there was any incidence of diversion / siphoning of funds by the Borrower. The cost of the investigation to be borne by the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	4.2 Reports
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) The Borrower shall furnish to the Lender project completion certificate from the statutory auditor/ Lender&#146;s&#146; engineer and such other reports as may
	be required by them.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(ii) The Borrower shall maintain fixed assets register as required by law from time to time and shall furnish to the Lender the extract of the
	fixed asset register within one month after implementation of the project and thereafter as on March 31st of each year during the currency of the Loan.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	4.3
	Expenditure records: Inspection
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The Borrower shall,
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	i) Maintain records
	showing expenditure incurred, utilisation of the disbursements out of the Loan the operations and financial condition of the Borrower and such records shall be open to examination by the Lender, and their authorised representatives.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ii) Allow the authorised representatives or nominees of the Lender including any auditor or technically qualified person to inspect the assets purchased out of the Loan and will
	give all facilities to enable such persons to report thereon.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	iii) The cost of inspection, including travelling and all other expenses, shall be payable by the
	Borrower to the Lender in this behalf.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director /
	Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage229"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG016.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ARTICLE V
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	EVENTS OF DEFAULTS AND CONSEQUENCES
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	5.1 If one or more of the events specified in this section (hereinafter called &#147;events of default&#148;) happen(s), the Lender may by a notice in writing to
	the Borrower, declare the principal of and all accrued interest on the Loan to be due and payable forthwith and the security created in terms of this Agreement shall become enforceable.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(a) Default in payment of principal sum of the Loan
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Default has occurred in the payment of
	principal sum of the Loan on the due dates.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) Default in payment of interest
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Default has been committed by the Borrower in payment of any instalment of interest on the Loan and such default has continued for a period of thirty days.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(c) Default in performance of covenants and conditions
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Default has occurred
	in the performance of any representation, warranty, other covenant condition or agreement on the part of the Borrower under this Agreement or any other agreement and such default has continued for a period of thirty days after notice in writing
	thereof has been given to the Borrower by the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(d) Inability to pay debts
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The Borrower is unable to pay its debts or proceedings for taking it into liquidation, either voluntarily or compulsorily, may be or have been commenced.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(e) Attachment or distraint on charged assets
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	If an attachment or distraint has been levied on
	the assets or any part thereof hypothecated/mortgaged to the Lender or certificate proceedings have been taken or commenced for recovery of any dues from the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(f) Appointment of receiver or liquidator
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	A receiver or liquidator has been appointed or
	allowed to be appointed of all or any part of the undertaking of the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(g) Sale, disposal and removal of assets
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	If, without the prior approval of the Lenders, any land, buildings, structures or plant and machinery of the Borrower are sold, disposed of, charged, encumbered or alienated or the
	said buildings, structures, machinery, plant or other equipment are removed, pulled down or demolished.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(h) Submission of misleading information
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Any information given by the Borrower in its application for Loan, in the reports and other information furnished by the Borrower in accordance with the Reporting System and the
	warranties given / deemed to have been given by the Borrower to the Lender is misleading or incorrect in any material respect.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage230"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG017.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(h) Cross defaults and cross acceleration
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) The
	Borrower&#146;s failure to pay any amount or meet with any obligation when due to any person other than the Lender or an event of default being constituted in relation to any of the Borrower&#146;s credit, borrowing or any other arrangement with any
	person other than the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) Any person other than the Lender accelerating repayment (i.e demanding repayment ahead of the previously agreed repayment
	schedule) due from the Borrower to such other person under the Borrower&#146;s credit, borrowing or any other arrangement with that person.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	5.2 If an event of
	default has taken place then the Lender shall have the right to publish the information in the manner it may consider appropriate.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	5.3 Notice to the Lender on the
	happening of an event of default
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	If any event of default or any event which, after the notice, or lapse of time, or both, would constitute an event of default has
	happened, the Borrower shall, forthwith give notice thereof to the Lender in writing specifying the nature of such event of default, or of such event.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	5.4 Expenses
	of preservation of assets of Borrower and of collection
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	All expenses incurred by the Lender after an event of default has occurred in connection with -
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(a) preservation and protection of the Borrower&#146;s assets (whether then or thereafter existing); and
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) collection of amounts due under this Agreement; shall be payable by the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	5.4 (a)
	Right to appoint whole time director / nominee director
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Upon the occurrence of an event of default the Lender has the right to appoint and remove from time to time
	Whole -time Director(s) /Nominee Director (s) on the Board of Directors of the Borrower. Such Whole -time Director(s) /Nominee Director (s) shall exercise such powers and duties as may be approved by the Lender and have such rights as are usually
	exercised by or are available to a Whole -time Director/Nominee Director (s) in the management of the affairs of the Borrower. Such Whole -time Director (s) /Nominee Director (s) shall not be required to hold qualification shares nor liable to
	retire by rotation and shall be entitled to receive such remuneration, fees, commission and monies as may be approved by the Lender. Such Whole -time Director(s) /Nominee Director (s) shall have the right to receive notices of and attend all general
	meetings and board meetings or any committee of the Borrower of which they are members.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Any expenses that may be incurred by the Lenders or such Whole -time
	Director(s)/ Nominee Director (s) in connection with their appointment or directorship shall be paid or reimbursed by the Borrower to the Lender or as the case may be, to such Whole -time Director(s) /Nominee Director(s).
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) Conversion right (Applicable to RTL)
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	If the Borrower continues to be in default for a
	period of thirty (30) days or more from due date of instalments of principal amounts of the Loan or interest thereon or any combination thereof, then, the Lender shall have the right to convert (which right is hereinafter referred to as &#147;the
	conversion right&#148;) at their option the whole or part of the outstanding amount of the Loan into fully paid-up equity shares of the Borrower, at par in the manner specified in a notice in writing to be given by the Lender to the Borrower (which
	notice is hereinafter referred to as the &#147;notice of conversion&#148;) prior to the date on which the
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage231"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG018.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	conversion is to take effect, which date shall be specified in the said notice (hereinafter referred to as the &#147;date of
	conversion&#148;).
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(i) On receipt of notice of conversion, the Borrower shall allot and issue the requisite number of fully paid-up equity shares to the Lender as
	from the date of conversion and the Lender shall accept the same in satisfaction of the principal amount of the Loan to the extent so converted. The part of the Loan so converted shall cease to carry interest as from the date of conversion and the
	Loan shall stand correspondingly reduced. Upon such conversion, the instalments of the Loan payable after the date of conversion as per the Amortization Schedule in this Agreement shall stand reduced proportionately by the amounts of the Loan so
	converted. The equity shares so allotted and issued to the Lender shall carry, from the date of conversion, the right to receive proportionately the dividends and other distributions declared or to be declared in respect of the equity capital of the
	Borrower. Save as aforesaid, the said shares shall rank pari passu with the existing equity shares of the Borrower in all respects. The Borrower shall, at all times, maintain sufficient unissued equity shares for the above purpose.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ii) The conversion right reserved as aforesaid may be exercised by the Lender on one or more occasions during the currency of the Loan.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	iii) The Borrower assures and undertakes that in the event of the Lender exercising the right of conversion as aforesaid, the Borrower shall get the equity shares which will be
	issued to the Lender as a result of the conversion, listed with the Stock Exchange(s) at Mumbai and such other places as may be notified by the Lender to the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For the purposes of this clause it shall not be construed as a default, if the Borrower approaches the Lender well in advance for postponement of principal or interest, as the case
	may be, and the Lender agree to the same.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Explanation: the term &#147;outstanding&#148; shall mean the principal amount of the Loan, interest and other monies
	payable thereon as at the time when the amounts are sought to be converted into equity shares of the Borrower.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage232"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG019.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ARTICLE VI
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	MISCELLANEOUS.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.1 Cancellation by notice to the Borrower
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The Lender may, by notice in writing to the
	Borrower, cancel the Loan or any part thereof, which the Borrower has not withdrawn prior to the giving of such notice.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.2 Suspension
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Further access by the Borrower to the use of the Loan may be suspended or terminated by the Lender:
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	i) Upon failure by the Borrower to carry out all or any of the terms of this Agreement or on the happening of any event of default as provided in this Agreement.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	ii) If any extra-ordinary situation makes it improbable that the Borrower would be able to perform its obligations under this Agreement.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	iii) If any change in the Borrower&#146;s set-up has taken place which, in the opinion of the Lender (which shall be final and binding on the Borrower), would adversely affect the
	conduct of the Borrower&#146;s business or the financial position or the efficiency of the Borrower&#146;s management or personnel or carrying on its activities.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.3 Suspension to continue till default remedied
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	The right of the Borrower to
	make withdrawals from the Loan shall continue to be suspended until the Lender has notified the Borrower that the right to make withdrawals has been restored.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.4
	Termination
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	If any of the events described above and elsewhere in this Agreement has been continuing or if the right of the Borrower to make withdrawals from the
	Loan shall have been suspended with respect to any amount of the Loan for a continuous period of thirty days or if the Borrower has not withdrawn the Loan by the date referred to herein or such later date as may be agreed to by the Lender then, in
	such event, the Lender may by notice in writing to the Borrower, terminate the right of the Borrower to make withdrawals. Upon such notice, the undrawn amount of the Loan/the Facility shall stand cancelled. Notwithstanding any cancellation,
	suspension or termination pursuant to the aforesaid provisions, all the provisions of this Agreement shall continue to be in full force and effect as herein specifically provided.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.5 Provisions relating to waiver
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	No delay in exercising or omission to exercise any right,
	power or remedy accruing to the Lender upon any default under this Agreement, security documents or any other agreement or document shall impair any such right, power or remedy or shall be construed to be a waiver thereof or any acquiescence in such
	default, nor shall the action or inaction of the Lender in respect of any default or any acquiescence by the Lender in any default, affect or impair any of its right, power or remedy in respect of any other default.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.6 Evidence and calculations
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(a) Accounts
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director / Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage233"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/07/25/0001193125-16-656592_G205441EX419PG020.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	In any legal action or proceedings arising out of or in connection with this Agreement, the entries made in the accounts maintained by
	the Lender shall be conclusive evidence of the existence and amount of obligations of the Borrower as therein recorded.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) Statement of accounts
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Any certification or determination by the Lender of a rate of interest or amount under this Agreement is conclusive evidence of the matters to which it relates.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.6 Effective date of Agreement
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	This Agreement shall become binding on the Borrower and the
	Lender on and from the date first above written. It shall be in force till all monies due and payable and disbursed from time to time under this Agreement are fully paid off.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.8 Assignments etc.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(a) The Borrower shall have no right of assignment under this Agreement
	without the prior approval of the Lender.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	(b) The Lender may securitise, assign, transfer or novate any of its rights and obligations under this Agreement, and or
	under the loan/security documents and the Borrower shall take such action as may be necessary to perfect such transaction.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.9 Service of notice
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Any notice or request to be given or made to the Lender or to the Borrower or to any other party shall be in writing. Such notice or request shall be deemed to have been given or
	made when it is delivered by hand or despatched by mail, e-mail, or fax, or overnight courier to the party to which it is required to be given or made at such party&#146;s designated address.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	6.10 Supremacy
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	If there is any inconsistency between these presents and the Sanction Letter,
	the Sanction Letter shall prevail.
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	For Videocon d2h Limited
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT" COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Director /
	Authorised Signatory
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Pursuant to Section&nbsp;302 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	I, Saurabh Pradipkumar Dhoot, certify that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 20-F of Videocon d2h Limited (the &#147;Company&#148;);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Based on my knowledge, this annual report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such
	statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the
	Company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company&#146;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over
	financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15(d)-15(f)) for the Company and have:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the Company, including its
	consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of
	financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	evaluated the effectiveness of the Company&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the
	period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	disclosed in this report any change in the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to
	materially affect, the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.
</TD>

	The Company&#146;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the Company&#146;s auditors and the Audit Committee of the
	Company&#146;s Board of Directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

</TD>

	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the Company&#146;s ability to record, process,
	summarize and report financial information; and

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the
	Company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company&#146;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over
	financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15(d)-15(f)) for the Company and have:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the Company, including its
	consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of
	financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	evaluated the effectiveness of the Company&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the
	period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	d)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	disclosed in this report any change in the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to
	materially affect, the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Company&#146;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the Company&#146;s auditors and the Audit Committee of the
	Company&#146;s Board of Directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the Company&#146;s ability to record, process,
	summarize and report financial information; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	d2h Limited (the &#147;Company&#148;) hereby certifies, to such officer&#146;s knowledge, that:
</P>

</TD>

	the accompanying annual report on Form 20-F of the Company for the year ended March 31, 2016 (the &#147;Report&#148;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or Section 15(d), as applicable, of the
	Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
